OOC: Sorry.  It's not easy replying when your computer's in the shop 
getting fixed.  I'm just catching up now.

Devilcat glares coldly at Vlad.  "Understand this, KHAN Vladimir 
Ward," he says, spitting out the rank as though it were a curse.  
"The Rogues answer to no-one except me.  And those who anger us pay 
dearly for it, as these misbegotten fools have no doubt learned from 
the death of their friend."  ('misbegotten fools' referring to the 
tripreds, and 'friend' meaning the late Burrock.)

The Rogue leader looks over his shoulder at Torin and Riekan.  The 
former gathers Jayde into his arms.

"We have no further business here," Devilcat growls.  "Rogues, back 
to base!"

All four bots vanish from sight, hearing, smell, and scanners, as 
they activate their cloaking devices and head back to Rogue Star.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Can someone respond, like Kyle, Deltazero or the Rogue's 
> controller? 
> 
> Bic:
> 
> Vladimir did not bother to answer her apoplogies. He started to 
doubt 
> if she truly was a warrior.
> Still, he thought, she could be. He would have to test her in the 
> appropriate time.
> 
> He waited for any response from the two groups.
